column1: # "plantlife" remix - contains everything from the plantlife modpack
# For all plantlife mods, calls to biome_lib have been crudely emulated by Minetest decorations, so
#       trees will not spawn in the same positions/quantities
# Did not import anything from the 3dmushrooms, nature_classic or vines mods
# From cavestuff, imported the pebbles, did not import the stalactites
# From dryplants, imported everything except the greater concentration of grass
# From poisonivy, imported everything and made the ivy poisonous
# From trunks, imported everything except roots (marked as "for testing purposes"), log decorations
# (This package provides litters based on ordinary dirt, as in the original mod)
# (This package provides litters based on all super dirts; choose one or the other package)
# (This package is required by both of the packages above)
